The Hongda Longbo Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Yangta Village, Xijiaokou Township, Xiangning County, Linfen City, Shanxi Province

operators: Datong Coal Mining Group Linfen Hongda Longbo Coal Industry Company
web_search_companies.notes: The facility is operated by Datong Coal Mining Group Linfen Hongda Longbo Coal Industry Company, which is a subsidiary of Jinneng Group.
